snippet: Late on Thursday afternoon, as the American destroyer U.S.S. Kidd loomed alongside this hijacked Iranian dhow, the warship’s loudspeaker issued a command in Urdu to the dhow’s frightened Urdu-speaking crew. American sailors stood ready, weapons...
lead_paragraph: Late on Thursday afternoon, as the American destroyer U.S.S. Kidd loomed alongside this hijacked Iranian dhow, the warship’s loudspeaker issued a command in Urdu to the dhow’s frightened Urdu-speaking crew. American sailors stood ready, weapons in hand.

headline.main: Somali pirates captured in the Gulf Of Oman
